subject: Bug fix package dependency issue
commitMessage:
Bug fix package dependency issue

Currently "Requires" libudev and mtdev
1) libudev is now a submod of systemd, so it should "Requires" systemd
2) mtdev is renamed to libmtdev (platform/upstream/mtdev)

Change-Id: I02b9aa4c98053a68cb85348215b9aa861b9ae81d
Signed-off-by: Quanxian Wang <quanxian.wang@intel.com>

comments.message: Patch Set 1: Verified+1
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: xorg-x11-drv-evdev should not try to build into a pure wayland platform..
commitMessage:
xorg-x11-drv-evdev should not try to build into a pure wayland platform..

This package is designed for an X server platform.

In a system released, based exclusively on Wayland platform, it should be in a excluded status.

Tizen devel  | Tizen release
_____________|______________
succeeded    | succeeded
excluded     | excluded
broken       |
failed       |
unresolvable |
blocked      |
locked       |
note:
    - The disabled status is only
      allowed for OBS administration.

Change-Id: I4460b62119f0b9ac69a4c393d3d94aeb5fca5021
Signed-off-by: Ronan Le Martret <ronan@fridu.net>
